website_summaries.verdict: The Phiaton MS 400 Moderna Series headphones are cool to look at and comfy to wear; the balanced audio quality make them a good choice for listeners with a diverse taste in music.
pros: The Phiaton MS 400 Moderna Series headphones feature solid sound quality and an eye-catching design that's also comfortable
cons: The Phiaton MS 400 headphones' Y-cable is not conducive to at-home listening, and the earcups tend to overheat the ears

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. They have great sound, very good and fast bass, solid mids, and treble is great, with no sibilance. They are very easy to drive, sounding great from portable player and my phone. I love how these fold up for travelling. They also look fantastic, and I get loads of compliments on the look of them. These don't have the greatest soundstage, but for a closed, portable headphone, I am very happy. If you have large ears, these may be uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent earphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent earphones. First the small negatives. The earphone marked right is actually the left side of the sound track and one marked left is the right. Once you know this it is not a big problem. The ear pads are so tight that it tends to make your ears hot. Everything else is great. The sound quality is excellent, they are light and comfortable, the accessories are perfect for earphones. The carrying case really works better than any case I have ever seen. It makes them a pleasure to take them on a trip. I now use them every time over my Sony MDR 7506.
customer_reviews.author: GCP

customer_reviews.title: Great looks, good sound, bad build quality
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these headphones in July 2010 and they just finally fell apart. I baby all my headphone purchases and within a few months the ear pads of these were torn. 3 years later the right earcup has fallen off and they are now totally unusable. 3 years is really not a long lifespan for a headphone, I've had other headphones for years longer and they still look like new without any tears. I personally liked the sound signature and portability of these headphones, but with this poor of build quality I would not recommend these to anyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Nord

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic sounding headphones. Beats Beats by a mile! Listened to same song on both (Beats and Phiaton) played using same iPod. The Phiaton's are way better. Much cleaner sound. I feel like I am listening to what was actually recorded, instead of some weird distortion.
customer_reviews.author: H. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance + Great Price = Huge Value
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a versatile set of phones for travel/home/work. I was not familiar with Phiaton, but their name kept coming up in a lot of the reviews here and on headphone sites/blogs as being a great product for the money. They fit great, are extremely comfortable, and sound great. I'm no audiophile, but the bass is a lot tighter than many others I've tried, the mids seem well balanced, and the high end is crisp without being too bright. While the sound isolation/reduction isn't huge, it still works well for travel, and the compact design and nice carrying case really help. Overall, this is a great set of cans for the money!
customer_reviews.author: W. Corrado

customer_reviews.title: very cool looking but uncomfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Decent, very cool looking but uncomfortable to wear. The sound is good but not amazing. I feel neutral about these. I sill use them, but I would also let anyone else use them without reservation. I can't justify buying new ones because they still work even 4 years later . Kind of waiting for them to break so I can buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: MorningFatty

customer_reviews.title: This brand is worth checking out
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money on Beats phones, with the bloated bass .. you get more for less with these Phiatons. I never heard of this brand before but when i started searching for a new set of headphone for my workouts, so many of the reviews were positive that I thought I'd give these a try. GLAD I DID! Smooth bass with little or no rumble .. crisp highs .. decent mids .. light and comfortable for enclosed ear phones .. all for around 100 bucks here on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Mark mason

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I returned home BEATS and bought these instead. Much truer sound than the bass-laden Beats. Lightweight and nice carry case. I use them often and no issues. Great sound for the $s!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M.

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate on these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I bought them to go on a long plane trip and now use them all of the time. The sound quality is great and the case makes it easy to keep track of. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Doodog

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on the basis of a recommendation I read in Stereophile. The most important factor to me was that they sounded good on an I-Pod. I have had these for a month and am enjoying listening to music again. I am not a heavy listener and usually listen for less than an hour at a time and only at home. When I saw these available for $128, I jumped on it and am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Doyle

customer_reviews.title: All Around Good Performance and Shielding
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is consistently good whether the content is a lullaby or rocker. While other newer headphones in this category (e.g. Beats) tend to over emphasize bass, the MS 400 delivers quality bass without overwhelming other frequencies. Also, can be wearing close to someone else without them being annoyed by sound spillover.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Ussery

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound
customer_reviews.text: Yep I love them. I have a variety of products from this company and all have been great purchases. Excellent quality and sound quality. No ear fatigue. The folding helps to easily put in my carry on bag.
customer_reviews.author: gghost

customer_reviews.title: Good for the on the go audiophile
customer_reviews.text: I have studio headphones at home, so am accustomed to clarity. Got these for plane travel when my Sennheiser's wore out. Like them alot, no noise suppression, so you have to have them turned up on a plane.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A Malchow

customer_reviews.title: They're great, but . . .
customer_reviews.text: I wanted noise-canceling headphones, and I thought I had read that these included the noise-canceling feature. I was wrong. They're beautiful, they're comfortable, and they work very well (though I'd have liked to have a volume control on the cord or on one of the earpieces). The sound is excellent, and I'd forgotten how much better any music sounds when you're not trying to listen to it in the midst of other, ambient noise. If they were noise-cancellers, they'd be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: TeeMitch50

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and looks
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and make great gifts. Very comfortable and sound great. I bought 4 pairs of these (1 in red n black and 3 in all black) and everyone loved them. Go and search the online reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Davies

customer_reviews.title: ... had these headphones for 7 and they still sound great!
customer_reviews.text: Have had these headphones for 7 and they still sound great!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Holm

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: sound is a bit cramped not much space kind of like every thing was thrown in to occupy on place on the stage. there is very little soundstage.
customer_reviews.author: chrism

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice light weight. Bass could be a little better or I would have rated them with 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tofur

customer_reviews.title: Good Cheap headphones
customer_reviews.text: A little on the bassy side but they work great and feel very confortable to me ears, 4 out of 5
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: between the design and size, this is an amazing pair of looking pair of headphones.. On sounds, these headphones do have a LOT of bass compairing to maybe beats but definetly 100000000 times cleary and punchy. WOuld definetly recomend these over them.. I also have a pair of AKG 271 and the highs arent as good with the ms 400s but they arent bad.. Overall for the price these are great looking headphones with a great soundstage fit for the price...
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyHubz

customer_reviews.title: very good headphones
customer_reviews.text: bought this can for my gf. she loves it. it looks really sharp and far far far better than those ugly beasts. they sound very good too, though i dont have other closed can to compare. my own cans are all open ones. a reminder: it may not look that good for guys to use. if you have a "tough face", dont use it.
customer_reviews.author: alwayseric

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not wowed
customer_reviews.text: After completing a lot of research, I finally decided on purchasing the Phiaton MS400 headphones. My purchases were based on the reviews of other Amazon buyers. The sound detail is great, its seemed to improve after a 20 hour or so break in period, the highs not overly high and the bass not "boomy" they do get a little uncomfortable after about an hour of use.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Belinowicz

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones Ever !!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to own a Bose On ear headphones. I thought it was good until i was given this as a gift. I was bumped up by the quality sound of the headphones. Just like an opera theater with good sound blocking. Good design and good bass. Perfect for all kinds of music. totally recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Ng

customer_reviews.title: satisfactory product for the $$$...however arrived without adapter as advertised
customer_reviews.text: had to go out and buy an adapter...I will contact them and request to get one sent...I will let you know what happens
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Joseph Bell

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Recently wore these on a trip to Hawaii. For the first 30-60 minutes they were great. After a while my ears started to hurt. These are a bit on the small side and did not completely fit over my ears like I thought. I've got normal size ears... I think.... The sound quality was very good. Surprising how much low end there was. They just didn't feel that good after a while on my ears. Returning them and looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Shookie

customer_reviews.title: durable, great sound, reliable
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that they do get slightly uncomfortable after lonnnggggg listening sessions but besides that they sound great, have survived my months of terrible treatment, hand my bass heavy music with ease, and were a great buy for the price. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: bobbyb

customer_reviews.title: great compact headphones
customer_reviews.text: these headphone are exactly what i wanted in every way. great sound quality, good price and compact enough for travel. i could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Onikaze

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality. Excellent bass. Nice weight. Easily hangs around neck. Pretty awful cord, plasticky, stiff. Highs and mids aren't amazing but okay. Wanted this as a replacement for my (no longer produced) Sennheiser 212Pros. They're good but I still prefer my 212Pros.
customer_reviews.author: Zeromus

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked the sound but two pair malfunctioned with a coupe of weeks. On the first pair one channel dropped way down in level and the next pair had serious distortion on one channel. ..
customer_reviews.author: Edmondbob

customer_reviews.title: Phiaton MS400 (black Ver. 2)
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Awesome phones, extension cable, nice case but awkard fit, comfy fit on head, look great Cons: Get warm on ears, cables look a lil flimsy but no problems so far
customer_reviews.author: Jag

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money, the sound quality is equal to that of 30$ headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Young

customer_reviews.title: Sound didn't impress.
customer_reviews.text: I felt the sound on these just wasnt' up to snuff. Bought based off of great reviews, but returned these as soon as I tested them. They were very easy to return, however, so if you think these are the headphones for you then I reccommend buying them and then if you find you don't like them you can return them. If I remember correctly, they also weren't all that comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phiaton MS 400 Headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones, bought from Amazon Warehouse, are very good. My complaint is that the product did not come with the original case (missing), but there was no mention of this on the product ad when it was purchased. That leaves a little bad taste on the purchase of this porduct!
customer_reviews.author: val918

customer_reviews.title: Wire Stripping near the plug
customer_reviews.text: After 11 months and 24 days noticed that the wires near the plug was are exposed for some unknown reason. I always hold the plug to unplug the unit from my iphone. An obvious product defect since the rubber covering has now receeded. Contacted & Emailed Customer service and was told they will transfer to a Tech Guy to see if they can repair this. Let's see how good Phiaton Customer Service and their Warranty in handling this.
customer_reviews.author: VTV

customer_reviews.title: No conversion jack for i-Pod
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why there was no conversion jack for the i-Pod. Why not? It would be a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Harber

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Bought these headphones Jan 15 received them mid March. Intially I thought these headphones were great until after about 15 hours, at an hours or so at a time. The left headphone went completly out. Huge dissapointment, paid 176$ for junk. I take exceptional care of all my electronics, these were never beat on or dropped, after every use they were properly stored in the case provided.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

product_meta.title: Phiaton MS 400 Carbon Fiber Headphones
product_meta.description:
Color:Red/Black| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingFROM THE MANUFACTURER


Recreating fine music detail for the ultimate listening experience no matter where you are
Honored with first prize at the International Design Awards and Digital Trends "Editor's Choice Award" The name Phiaton signifies high quality sound technology combined with elegant design--a philosophy that's epitomized in the MS 400 Moderna Series of headphones. An attention-getting design is backed up by luxurious audio performance that stands apart. An oversized adjustable padded headband and richly-padded earcups that swivel up to 180 degrees set a new standard in listening comfort. The bold styling, opulent accents, and world-class sonic performance of the MS 400 captures every nuance of your favorite music, delivering it the way it was meant to be heard

Instantly feel the noise isolating performance as the ultra-soft pads seal around your ears
Experience deep rich bass, a full-bodied midrange, and sparkling high notes. View larger CARBON GRAPHITE DESIGN FOR DEEP, RICH SOUND
Designed to tease out subtle sonic nuances, the Phiaton MS 400 is constructed with a carbon fiber enclosure. Carbon fiber combines the properties of extreme strength and remarkably light weight, making it the ideal material for the MS 400's design. This light, durable quality and modern aesthetic appeal explain why carbon fiber can be found in luxury automobiles, watches and other high-end products. Phiaton takes the concept a step further by encasing the carbon in a high-polymer enclosure. This advanced construction also provides an optimized airflow for the 40mm electrostatic drivers. Taken together, these qualities give the listener better resonance, rich bass, full-bodied midrange, and sparkling high notes.

AN EYE-CATCHING DESIGN, WITH COMFORT AND CONVENIENCE TO MATCH
The Phiaton MS 400 sports an eye-catching design and luxurious high-end audio performance. It's an adrenaline rush of sleek, bold styling, and the opulent red accent color will make a statement anywhere you go. The MS 400's soft, comfortable pads can be worn for long periods of time without fatigue, making them ideal for commuting and air travel. You will instantly feel the noise isolating performance as the ultra-soft pads seal around your ear, wrapping you in your favorite music.

The lightweight MS 400 lets you enjoy your music wherever you are, no matter if it's at home, in the office, or on the go. Weighing just 6.5oz, these highly wearable "fold and go" headphones fit conveniently into the included carrying case for safe storage and easy travel.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Phiaton MS 400 Moderna Series Headphones, 6.3mm stereo gold plated plug, compact carrying case, Owner's Guide (Including 1-year warranty), product registration card.



TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
 * Drivers: Studio Grade 40 mm Electrodynamic Drivers
 * Impedance: 32 Ohm
 * Frequency Range: 15 Hz ~ 22,000 Hz
 * Sensitivity: 98 dB
 * Max input power: 1000 mW
 * Cord Length: 3.93 ft. / 1.2 m
 * Weight: 6.5 oz. / 185 g without cord
feature_bullets: Carbon fiber enclosure for high quality audio
Optimized airflow delivers concert hall sound quality
Closed-ear design promotes greater noise reduction
Flexible 'fold and go' design comes with Compact carrying case for easy travel
3.5mm standard gold plated & 6.3mm Stereo adaptor plug

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars73 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
